mapper.select:
select rec_seq, convert(varchar(19),rec_datm,121) as rec_datm , rec_date , convert(varchar(8),rec_start_time,108) as rec_start_time , convert(varchar(8),rec_end_time,108) as rec_end_time , convert(varchar(8),rec_call_time,108) as rec_call_time , system_code, company_code, business_code , local_no,channel_no,rec_keycode,rec_inout,rec_filename,user_id,user_name , cust_id,cust_name,cust_tel,cust_jumin,web_url , isnull(rec_enc_code,'0') rec_enc_code , isnull(rec_store_code,'0') rec_store_code , isnull((select system_ip from tbl_system WITH(NOLOCK) where system_code = tbl_record${dateStr}.system_code),'') system_ip from tbl_record${dateStr} WITH(NOLOCK) where rec_datm between convert(datetime, #{rec_date} + ' 00:00:00.000') and convert(datetime, #{rec_date} + ' 23:59:59.997') and rec_keycode = #{rec_keycode} and local_no =#{local_no}
order by rec_datm asc, rec_start_time asc

select rec_seq, convert(varchar(19),rec_datm,121) as rec_datm , rec_date , convert(varchar(8),rec_start_time,108) as rec_start_time , convert(varchar(8),rec_end_time,108) as rec_end_time , convert(varchar(8),rec_call_time,108) as rec_call_time , system_code, company_code, business_code , local_no,channel_no,rec_keycode,rec_inout,rec_filename,user_id,user_name , cust_id,cust_name,cust_tel,cust_jumin,web_url , isnull(rec_enc_code,'0') rec_enc_code , isnull(rec_store_code,'0') rec_store_code , isnull((select system_ip from tbl_system WITH(NOLOCK) where system_code = tbl_record${dateStr}.system_code),'') system_ip from tbl_record${dateStr} WITH(NOLOCK) where rec_datm between convert(datetime, #{rec_date} + ' 00:00:00.000') and convert(datetime, #{rec_date} + ' 23:59:59.997') and rec_keycode = #{rec_keycode} and local_no =#{local_no} and user_id=#{user_id} order by rec_datm asc, rec_start_time asc
